mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user(username, email, password, create_time, postcode, phone, realname, addr1, addr2, point, auth) values(#{username}, #{email}, #{password}, now(), #{postcode}, #{phone}, #{realname}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{point}, #{auth} )
mapper.select: select count(*) as cnt from tbl_user where username = #{username}
mapper.update: update tbl_user set auth = 'y' where username = #{username}
update tbl_user set point = #{point} where username = #{username}
mapper.select:
